ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I m pretty good at getting an enthrall off between being hit if 1) the thing doesn t stun, 2) there is only ONE thing on me. (Multiples becomes
ygData.messageBody:
>6) We can cast while being hit (an enchanter cannot)

Actually, I'm pretty good at getting an enthrall off between being hit
if 1) the thing doesn't stun, 2) there is only ONE thing on me.
(Multiples becomes much more difficult to time)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
